title: Mother Attacks ‘Privileged’ Anti-Vaxx Parents Who Exposed Her Baby To Measles
cleaned_text:
This is my son Griffin, and he may have measles.

Any parent would be protective of their baby but especially if they had previously lost a child. Such is the case for a woman from Pickering, Toronto named Jennifer Hibben-White who blasted anti-vaccine parents that exposed her baby to measles at her doctor’s office. Two years ago, Hibben-White suffered the loss of her first baby daughter due to a blood infection. The below Facebook post has seen over 290,000 shares since last week.

opengraph.title: Mother Attacks ‘Privileged’ Anti-Vaxx Parents Who Exposed Her Baby To Measles
